Class Player

java.lang.Object
base.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
HumanPlayer, VirtualPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
Abstract base class representing a player in the JEST game. Players have a hand of cards, a Jest (collection of won cards), and a strategy.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, PlayStrategy strategy)
      Creates a player with a name and strategy.
      Parameters:
      name - The player's name
      strategy - The player's decision-making strategy

  • Method Details

    • makeOffer

      public abstract Offer makeOffer()
      Creates an offer from the player's hand. Must be implemented by subclasses.
      Returns:
      The offer created by the player

    • takeOffer

      public void takeOffer(Offer offer, boolean takeFaceUp)
      Takes a card from an offer and adds it to the Jest.
      Parameters:
      offer - The offer to take from
      takeFaceUp - true to take face-up card, false for face-down

    • calculateFinalScore

      public int calculateFinalScore(ScoreVisitor visitor)
      Calculates the final score using a visitor.
      Parameters:
      visitor - The score visitor to use
      Returns:
      The calculated score

      Parameters:
      card - The card to add

      Clears all cards from the player's hand.
